select g.id, g.title, g.item_id, i.title as item_name, g.start_time, g.end_time, g.num, g.expire_time, g.create_time, g.update_time from group_booking g left join item i on g.item_id = i.id where g.deleted = false
and ( g.title like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%') or i.title like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%'))
and g.end_time < now()
and now() between g.start_time and g.end_time
and g.start_time > now()
order by g.id desc
select id, title, item_id, sku_value, num, expire_time from group_booking where id = #{bookingId} and deleted = false and now() between start_time and end_time

select t.item_id, t.num as groupNum, t.max_discount_amount, r.title, r.cover_url, r.min_price, r.sale_num from group_booking t inner join item r on t.item_id = r.id where r.state = 1 and r.deleted = false and t.deleted = false and now() between t.start_time and t.end_time and r.min_price > 0
and r.title like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler} ,'%')
order by r.min_price, r.recommend desc
order by r.total_num desc, r.recommend desc
order by r.score desc, r.recommend desc
order by t.max_discount_amount desc, r.recommend desc
order by r.recommend desc, t.id desc
